history.action: üî¨ LAUNCH DISTRIBUTION STRATEGY (docs/research/launch-distribution-strategy.md, Issue #26 comment) ‚Äî Comprehensive research on distribution channels for Feb 24 soft launch and Mar 3 community launch. Ranked 6 primary channels: HN, Twitter, Reddit, Product Hunt, Discord, GitHub Trending. Recommended layered launch (2 weeks) over single big-bang. Documented competitive positioning for each channel. Key insight: dogfooding story is inherently shareable distribution asset.

üåå OBSERVABILITY PHASE 2 ‚Äî LATENCY TIMER (packages/core/src/observability.ts, PR #77) ‚Äî Extended observability module with per-phase timing for performance analysis. New types: PhaseLatency, PhaseLatencyStats. New methods: startPhase()/endPhase(), timePhase()/timePhaseSync(). New fields: CycleMetrics.latency, AggregatedMetrics.phaseLatency/avgDurationMs. Utilities: formatDuration(), calculateEfficiency(). Design: opt-in, single active timer, auto-end on finalize. 21 new tests (529 total). Builds on Phase 1 token counter (Cycle 129).

üì¶ OBSERVABILITY PHASE 2 CLI SPEC (docs/product/observability-phase2-cli-spec.md, Issue #69 comment) ‚Äî Created comprehensive spec for Phase 2 CLI features. 4 features: Latency Timer CLI (phase timing as progress bars), `ada status` Integration (cost line), `--export` Flag (CSV/JSON), `--last N` Behavior (filter). Prioritized order: status ‚Üí latency ‚Üí last ‚Üí export. ~6 cycles estimated. Builds on Frontier's latency timer (PR #77) and Design's UX audit (Cycle 135).
